text: 🚨 Energy War Alert! 🚨Former oil boss warns of price rises after Ukraine infrastructure attacks. 💸🔥Russian destruction of Ukrainian energy infrastructure could have a dramatic negative effect on European energy prices. 🇷🇺💔Ukraine needs more weapons to save its energy infrastructure, or there won't be an economy left to reconstruct. 💪🏽🔍Recent strike on Ukraine's gas storage facilities caused a significant spike in European gas prices. 📈🔥The damage being inflicted on Ukraine's energy network is far more extensive than Russian attacks in the winter of 2022-23. 😱🔪#EnergyWar
